title: Is there any scholarship for B.E. after diploma? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have not mentioned in which state you are. Yeah, there are some scholarship schemes for D to D students also. If you are in Gujarat, then “Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana” (MYSY) scheme is running under state govt. In this scheme, you will get 50% of your college fees amount along with hostel fees and books or stationary expense (stationary expense is only for the first time) in your bank account followed by a legal process. You can check online. MYSY (http://mysy.guj.nic.in/) Kind regards.
Scholarships are for regular students.Diploma to BE is a separate track at least in Maharashtra.Check with DTE,Mumbai.
